body_html:
After all the steps posted above, pip install numpy pyyaml etc, I then ran:

MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET=10.9 CC=clang CXX=clang++ python setup.py build develop
and also tried modifying MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET.
body_text:
After all the steps posted above, pip install numpy pyyaml etc, I then ran:
MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET=10.9 CC=clang CXX=clang++ python setup.py build develop
and also tried modifying MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET.
body:
After all the steps posted above, `pip install numpy pyyaml` etc, I then ran:

`MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET=10.9 CC=clang CXX=clang++ python setup.py build develop` 
and also tried modifying `MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET`.
